title: 日本ダービーの後に・昇り炎舞

text.jpText:
サクラチヨノオーとメジロアルダンの
執念の走り。2人の気迫に負けじと
ヤエノムテキもかつてない闘争心を見せる。
text.enText:
Sakura Chiono O and Mejiro Ardan's persistent 
run. Yaenomuteki also showed an unprecedented 
fighting spirit.

text.jpText:
結果はサクラチヨノオーが1着。
ヤエノムテキは、2人の執念に引っ張られて
自分もよい走りができたと感謝を述べた。
text.enText:
The result was that Sakura Chiono O took 
first place. Yaenomuteki thanked the two for 
their persistence. Yaenomuteki expressed her 
gratitude that she, too, was able to run 
well, pulled by the persistence of the two.

text.jpText:
だが、ヤエノムテキはトレーナーに告げる。
最善の走りはできたものの、暴走しかけて
しまった。今後に不安が残る……と。
text.enText:
But Yaenomteki tells the trainer. I had my 
best run, but I almost went out of control. 
I'm worried about the future. She is 
concerned about the future of ……

text.jpText:
ならば、『火水合一』の完成度を高めようと
提案するトレーナー。ヤエノムテキも、
自分も同じ考えだったと賛成する。
text.enText:
Then, the trainer proposes to improve the 
perfection of "fire-water-agoei". Yaenomoteki 
agrees, saying that she had the same idea. 
Yaenomoteki agrees that she had the same idea.

text.jpText:
そう、次の『菊花賞』に向けて意気込むが――
後日、サクラチヨノオーとメジロアルダンが、
ケガで出走を見送るという報せが届いた。
text.enText:
Yes, she was eager to run in the next race, 
the Kikka-sho, but later she received the 
news that Sakura Chiono O and Mejiro Ardan 
were not going to run in the race due to 
injuries. Later, however, news arrived that 
Sakura Chiono O and Mejiro Ardan had to 
forego the race due to injury.

coloredText.enText:
Chrysanthemum Festival (the 9th day of the 
9th lunar month) (one celebrated in October)
